question: How old was Woody Herman when he founded his own orchestra?
chain_of_thought_result:
Woody Herman was born on May 16, 1913. He founded his own orchestra, known as the Woody Herman Orchestra, in 1944. 

To calculate his age at that time:

1. Start with the year he founded the orchestra: 1944.
2. Subtract the year of his birth: 1944 - 1913 = 31.

Therefore, Woody Herman was 31 years old when he founded his own orchestra.
